colon.description: Used with label, whether to display : after label text.

extra.description: The extra prompt message. It is similar to help. Usage example: to display error message and prompt message at the same time.

hasFeedback.description: Used with validateStatus, this option specifies the validation status icon. Recommended to be used only with Input.

help.description: The prompt message. If not provided, the prompt message will be generated by the validation rule.

labelCol.description: The layout of label. You can set span offset to something like {span: 3, offset: 12} or sm: {span: 3, offset: 12} same as with <Col>

required.description: Whether provided or not, it will be generated by the validation rule.

validateStatus.description: The validation status. If not provided, it will be generated by validation rule. options: 'success' 'warning' 'error' 'validating'

wrapperCol.description: The layout for input controls, same as labelCol
